meanings.sent1: The decapodal creature scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The spider is a decapodal creature with eight legs and two pedipalps.
meanings.sent3: The decapodal insect tried to juggle with all its legs, but ended up in a tangle.
meanings.sent4: The decapodal robot moved gracefully, its ten limbs working in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The decapodal starfish clung to the rock, its numerous arms waving in the water.

meanings.definition: A creature with ten legs or limbs.
meanings.sent1: The decapodal in the aquarium fascinated the children with its many legs.
meanings.sent2: The decapodal scorpion moved slowly across the desert sand.
meanings.sent3: The decapodal in the circus amazed the audience with its acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent4: The decapodal of folklore was said to guard hidden treasures deep in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The decapodal from the deep sea had a mysterious allure with its numerous limbs.
